comments.author: CryptSafe
comments.body: Congratulations to you! I must say that you have a good announcement thread coupled with graphics and the website user interface. I see that your services cover all cryptospheres. I wish you could make your trusted clients known here just as you have stated them on your website so that members would see for themselves how far you have gone in rendering your services. This could also attract and sell your services to other prospective clients interested in or looking for someone to contract for their offers. I like your concept. Congratulations once more.

comments.author: wwzsocki
comments.created_time: November 18, 2023, 12:47:54 AMLast edit: November 18, 2023, 01:04:33 AM by wwzsocki
comments.body: Quote from: CryptSafe on November 17, 2023, 06:08:54 PMCongratulations to you! ...Thank you, really appreciate your opinionQuote from: CryptSafe on November 17, 2023, 06:08:54 PM...I wish you could make your trusted clients known here just as you have stated them on your website so that members would see for themselves how far you have gone in rendering your services. This could also attract and sell your services to other prospective clients interested in or looking for someone to contract for their offers...I agree that adding old clients also here will be great marketing move, but the problem is that not all clients will agree to be mentioned and usually we have agreements that we wont share any info about our cooperation. No wonder considering the services we offer, some guerrilla marketing strategies are still seen as black hat once.

comments.body: Happy to see this new ANN thread, @wwzsockiWe have been working quite regularly on various crypto projects for the past 3 years, and it's always a pleasure. Everything is clear and well-organized for everybody from the beginning: prices, costs, delivery times, revisions, modifications... and he always ensures that the client is 100% satisfied before considering the work completed.One of the best business partners I have ever had, highly recommended.
